channel.title: Comments on: Back to the Beach
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: What a Long Strange Trip It’s Been | Project Pink Day
item.dc:creator: What a Long Strange Trip It’s Been | Project Pink Day
item.description: […] Luckily we did! We were rewarded with two perfect, hot, sunny beach days and got to show our friends our old stomping grounds. For us it was a nice final goodbye to the place we’d called home for the summer. If you want more details, you can get it all at our Back to the Beach post. […]
item.content:encoded:
[…] Luckily we did! We were rewarded with two perfect, hot, sunny beach days and got to show our friends our old stomping grounds. For us it was a nice final goodbye to the place we’d called home for the summer. If you want more details, you can get it all at our Back to the Beach post. […]
